    • Uses of MentalStateCondition in languageTools.program.agent.actions

      Methods in languageTools.program.agent.actions that return MentalStateCondition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract MentalStateCondition Action.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      Returns the precondition for this Action.
      MentalStateCondition AdoptAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      Returns the precondition of this AdoptAction.
      MentalStateCondition AdoptOneAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      Returns the precondition of this AdoptOneAction.
      MentalStateCondition DeleteAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of a DeleteAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the Update to the BeliefBase is closed.
      MentalStateCondition DropAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of an DropAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition ExitModuleAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of an ExitModuleAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition InsertAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of an InsertAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition LogAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of a LogAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition ModuleCallAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      Returns the precondition of this ModuleCallAction.
      MentalStateCondition PrintAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of a PrintAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition SendAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of a SendAction is true, or, to be more precise "bel(true)"; this means it can always be performed if the action is closed.
      MentalStateCondition SendOnceAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      The precondition of a SendOnceAction is that there is a non-empty set of receivers of the message to be sent that should receive this message but did not receive it yet; otherwise the precondition fails.
      MentalStateCondition UserSpecAction.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
      Returns a condition of the form "bel(precondition)" where precondition is the precondition from the first action specification.
      MentalStateCondition UserSpecOrModuleCall.getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
